ticket.title: Objective and gate evidence exporters for RFC-0027

tickets.reason: Policy and lifecycle control surfaces must exist before objective/gate exporters can report complete state.
Verifier economics exports depend on instrumentation and bound evaluation outputs.

in_scope: Export objective summary artifacts for OBJ-PCAC-01 through OBJ-PCAC-06 at declared evidence paths.
Export gate summary artifacts for all PCAC gates used by machine predicates.
Wire deterministic predicate evaluation hooks for CI/gate execution.
Ensure unknown-state fields are emitted to support fail-closed predicate semantics.
out_of_scope: Governance process changes outside artifact generation and predicate wiring.
Manual council adjudication tooling beyond evidence export format.

steps: Implement objective summary exporters with stable field names required by jq predicates.
Implement gate summary exporters for lifecycle, single-consume, freshness, and replay gates.
Add deterministic CI checks that execute RFC-0027 objective/gate predicates over exported summaries.
Add negative tests for missing/partial summary fields to validate fail-closed behavior.
Run cargo fmt --all && cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings && cargo test --workspace.

criteria: All RFC-0027 objective and gate summaries are emitted at declared paths.
Machine predicates evaluate deterministically against exported summaries.
Unknown/missing predicate fields produce fail-closed outcomes.

notes.security: Gate decisions must be machine-replayable; missing evidence state is non-admissible.
notes.verification: Include predicate execution logs and malformed-summary failure tests.
